name: Lifeline (Jonu)
description:
The islanders need your help! In the midst of a virus outbreak, resources are running scarce, and you are the people's last hope. Using your trusty airplane Condor-19 you will airdrop the supplies required by each island. The skies aren't clear though - steer away from other planes used by greedy hoarders from abroad! If you manage to shoot them down, you can reclaim their cargo and return the precious resources to the people who need them.

  >> Controls <<
[WASD] - control the aircraft
[LMB] - shoot
[RMB] - change packages
[Space] - drop a package

  >> How to play? <<
There are three types of packages: Toilet Paper, Pasta Packets, Medical Masks.
Aiming with the reticle, drop packages on the target pads to score.
Gain fuel and double score for dropping the indicated, most needed package.
Avoid bumping into other planes, shoot them down to claim their cargo.
Cargo is indicated by ribbons hanging off the planes.
The game ends when you're out of fuel.

The game was made in three days for Mini Jam 50: Islands, with the limitation of "only one level". It wasn't limiting at all.
